Authorities have evacuated nearby residents as a precautionary measure after initial reports incorrectly indicated a building collapse in the Jaitpur area.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/wall-collapses-in-delhis-harinagar-fire-tenders-on-spot/articleshow/123200585.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/wall-collapses-in-delhis-harinagar-fire-tenders-on-spot/articleshow/123200585.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 10:13:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1157573" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123200584,imgsize-1157573.cms"/></item><item><title>Drowning Delhi: Flooded roads, stuck cars and soaked capital - heavy rains lash city</title><description><![CDATA[Delhi was severely affected by incessant heavy rains, leading to widespread waterlogging and traffic disruptions across key areas like Vasant Kunj and Connaught Place. The India Meteorological Department initially issued a red alert, which was later downgraded to yellow, forecasting continued thunderstorms until August 12. The city recorded significant rainfall, with Safdarjung reporting 78.7 mm.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/drowning-delhi-flooded-roads-stuck-cars-and-soaked-capital-heavy-rains-lash-city/articleshow/123200644.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/drowning-delhi-flooded-roads-stuck-cars-and-soaked-capital-heavy-rains-lash-city/articleshow/123200644.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 10:57:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="3525763" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123201025,imgsize-3525763.cms"/></item><item><title>ICICI bank raises minimum balance for new customers: Rs 50,000 in cities</title><description><![CDATA[ICICI Bank has raised the minimum average balance requirement for new savings accounts opened from August 1st. The new MAB is Rs 50,000 for metro/urban, Rs 25,000 for semi-urban, and Rs 10,000 for rural locations.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/new-rules-icici-bank-raises-minimum-balance-for-new-customers-here-are-the-details/articleshow/123202008.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/new-rules-icici-bank-raises-minimum-balance-for-new-customers-here-are-the-details/articleshow/123202008.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 12:42:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="36160" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123202129,imgsize-36160.cms"/></item><item><title>'Will not give land to occupier': Zelenskyy rules out ceding Ukraine territory to Russia</title><description><![CDATA[As Trump and Putin prepare for a summit in Alaska, Zelenskyy insists that no decisions about Ukraine should be made without Ukraine's involvement. He firmly rejects ceding any territory to Russia, emphasizing that Ukrainians will not give their land to the occupier. Zelenskyy believes that any agreement excluding Ukraine is doomed to fail and will not bring lasting peace.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/will-not-give-land-to-occupier-zelenskyy-issues-warning-rules-out-ceding-ukraine-territory-to-russia/articleshow/123202392.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/will-not-give-land-to-occupier-zelenskyy-issues-warning-rules-out-ceding-ukraine-territory-to-russia/articleshow/123202392.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 13:26:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1143446" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123202510,imgsize-1143446.cms"/></item><item><title>Nvidia CEO checks salaries of company's entire 42,000 employees</title><description><![CDATA[Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang personally reviews the compensation of all 42,000 employees monthly, utilizing machine learning to optimize the process. He dismisses rumors of secret stock options, emphasizing generous compensation for all workers. Huang believes in prioritizing employee well-being, which he feels drives overall success. This strategy has significantly benefited Nvidia's leadership, creating billionaires within his management team.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/nvidia-ceo-jensen-huang-checks-salaries-of-companys-entire-42000-employees-says-its-a-strategy-that-/articleshow/123194662.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/nvidia-ceo-jensen-huang-checks-salaries-of-companys-entire-42000-employees-says-its-a-strategy-that-/articleshow/123194662.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 23:44:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="43658" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123194569,imgsize-43658.cms"/></item><item><title>Gold again! Gukesh, Pranav and now this — Velammal keeps minting talents</title><description><![CDATA[Velammal MHS School's chess team triumphed at the 2025 World Schools Team Championship, continuing India's chess dominance. The Chennai-based institution, known for nurturing chess talent like GMs D Gukesh and R Praggnanandhaa, provides academic flexibility and professional coaching. Velammal's success, fueled by Chennai's chess culture and support for players, solidifies its reputation as a "Chess Factory."]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/gold-again-world-chess-champion-d-gukesh-world-junior-champion-pranav-v-and-now-this-velammal-keeps-minting-talents/articleshow/123202045.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/gold-again-world-chess-champion-d-gukesh-world-junior-champion-pranav-v-and-now-this-velammal-keeps-minting-talents/articleshow/123202045.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 12:40:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>JYOTIRMOY HALDER</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="117336" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123202117,imgsize-117336.cms"/></item><item><title>Happy Raksha Bandhan: 70+ wishes, messages, quotes & more - check here</title><description><![CDATA[Raksha Bandhan 2025 is a time to cherish the unique bond shared with siblings, often our first rivals and greatest supporters. This day offers a chance to pause and remember childhood memories, reminding our partners-in-crime of their enduring significance. The celebration emphasizes love, protection, and the unbreakable connection that withstands distance and life's changes.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/relationships/family/happy-raksha-bandhan-2025-20-wishes-messages-quotes-images-greetings-gifs-cards-girs-facebook-whatsapp-status-sticker/articleshow/123136995.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/relationships/family/happy-raksha-bandhan-2025-20-wishes-messages-quotes-images-greetings-gifs-cards-girs-facebook-whatsapp-status-sticker/articleshow/123136995.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 21:00:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="60704" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123137078,imgsize-60704.cms"/></item><item><title>Delhi restaurant owner apologises after couple denied entry over Indian attire</title><description><![CDATA[Following outrage over a Delhi restaurant allegedly denying entry to a couple for wearing Indian attire, Tourism Minister Kapil Mishra reported that the owner has apologized and will offer Rakshabandhan discounts for women in traditional wear. An investigation was launched after a video surfaced showing the couple's complaint.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/we-will-not-tolerate-such-discrimination-delhi-restaurant-owner-apologises-after-couple-denied-entry-over-indian-attire-scraps-dress-code-after-outrage/articleshow/123199247.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/we-will-not-tolerate-such-discrimination-delhi-restaurant-owner-apologises-after-couple-denied-entry-over-indian-attire-scraps-dress-code-after-outrage/articleshow/123199247.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 07:12:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1095257" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123199279,imgsize-1095257.cms"/></item><item><title>ChatGPT advice lands 60-year-old man in hospital; the reason will surprise you</title><description><![CDATA[A New York man was hospitalized with dangerously low sodium levels after following a strict, AI-generated diet plan from ChatGPT. The AI tool suggested a toxic substitute, sodium bromide, leading to severe health issues, including hallucinations and neurological symptoms. This case underscores the critical need for professional medical consultation when interpreting AI health advice to avoid misinformation and potential harm.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/chatgpt-advice-lands-60-year-old-man-in-hospital-the-reason-will-surprise-you/articleshow/123200430.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/chatgpt-advice-lands-60-year-old-man-in-hospital-the-reason-will-surprise-you/articleshow/123200430.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 10:03:12 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="15944" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123200467,imgsize-15944.cms"/></item><item><title>Injured vs India, Woakes mulls risky rehab — 'A risk you’re willing to take'</title><description><![CDATA[England's Chris Woakes faced a tough decision regarding his injured shoulder, sustained during the fifth Test against India. He is contemplating rehab to potentially avoid surgery, aiming for a quicker return and a chance to participate in the Ashes series in Australia later this year. Woakes' determination to play is evident, highlighted by his courageous batting display despite the injury.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/injured-vs-india-racing-for-the-ashes-chris-woakes-mulls-risky-rehab-a-risk-youre-willing-to-take/articleshow/123202851.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/injured-vs-india-racing-for-the-ashes-chris-woakes-mulls-risky-rehab-a-risk-youre-willing-to-take/articleshow/123202851.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 13:54:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="82116" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123202905,imgsize-82116.cms"/></item><item><title>Bengaluru: Man slits throat of 14-year-old nephew over demand for gaming phone</title><description><![CDATA[In Bengaluru, a 55-year-old security guard confessed to murdering his 14-year-old nephew after an argument over money for a mobile game. Naga Prasad surrendered to police after a failed suicide attempt, leading to the discovery of the teenager's body in his rented room. Prasad admitted to slitting his nephew's throat due to his constant demands and arrogant behavior.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/security-guard-kills-nephew-in-bengaluru-surrenders-after-4-days/articleshow/123195218.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/security-guard-kills-nephew-in-bengaluru-surrenders-after-4-days/articleshow/123195218.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 00:00:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="21382" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123199709,imgsize-21382.cms"/></item><item><title>Bazball's revolution: How England's bold era is tilting Test cricket towards the batters</title><description><![CDATA[Since Brendon McCullum's arrival, England's Test cricket has transformed with 'Bazball,' marked by aggressive play and high win rates. This shift coincides with flatter pitches, favouring batters and potentially diminishing the traditional advantage for seam bowlers. While entertaining and popular, this approach raises concerns about the long-term balance of Test cricket, as bowler-friendly conditions become increasingly scarce.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/bazballs-revolution-how-englands-bold-new-era-is-tilting-test-cricket-towards-the-batters/articleshow/123201277.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/bazballs-revolution-how-englands-bold-new-era-is-tilting-test-cricket-towards-the-batters/articleshow/123201277.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 11:28:15 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>HIJAM RAJU SINGH</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="85190" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123201358,imgsize-85190.cms"/></item><item><title>An entire country is shifting to Australia, as first planned migration is underway</title><description><![CDATA[Tuvalu, a Pacific island nation, faces imminent submersion due to rising sea levels, prompting a groundbreaking planned migration. A treaty with Australia allows 280 Tuvaluans annually to gain permanent residency, accessing essential services.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/an-entire-country-is-shifting-to-australia-as-first-planned-migration-is-underway/articleshow/123165321.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/an-entire-country-is-shifting-to-australia-as-first-planned-migration-is-underway/articleshow/123165321.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 16:36:10 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="59922" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123165348,imgsize-59922.cms"/></item><item><title>12-year-old boy pours boiling water on sleeping younger brother; prank goes wrong</title><description><![CDATA[In a disturbing incident, a 12-year-old boy in Lancaster Township inflicted severe burns on his nine-year-old brother by pouring hot water on him as he slept, mimicking a dangerous "Hot Water Challenge" seen on social media. The younger brother was hospitalized with burns to his neck and chest. This incident highlights the perilous consequences of social media stunts, echoing past cases where children have suffered serious injuries.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/social-media-stunt-12-year-old-boy-pours-boiling-water-on-sleeping-younger-brother-prank-goes-wrong/articleshow/123201750.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/social-media-stunt-12-year-old-boy-pours-boiling-water-on-sleeping-younger-brother-prank-goes-wrong/articleshow/123201750.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 12:42:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="719691" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123201784,imgsize-719691.cms"/></item><item><title>'Wanted to see how it works': Passenger opens emergency exit cover mid-takeoff</title><description><![CDATA[An Akasa Airlines flight from Varanasi to Bengaluru faced a delay when a passenger, Ajay Tiwari, mistakenly opened the emergency exit handle cover. The incident occurred as the flight was preparing for takeoff, prompting its return to the apron for safety checks.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/varanasi/opened-it-by-mistake-wanted-to-see-how-it-works-passenger-opens-emergency-exit-cover-mid-takeoff-at-varanasi-akasa-flight-delayed-by-an-hour-man-held/articleshow/123201292.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/varanasi/opened-it-by-mistake-wanted-to-see-how-it-works-passenger-opens-emergency-exit-cover-mid-takeoff-at-varanasi-akasa-flight-delayed-by-an-hour-man-held/articleshow/123201292.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 11:21:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="596617" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123201387,imgsize-596617.cms"/></item><item><title>Rakhi with donor’s hand: Mumbai teen meets her ‘new brother’ in Gujarat</title><description><![CDATA[In a poignant Raksha Bandhan celebration in Gujarat, Anamta Ahmad, recipient of a hand transplant from the late Riya Mistry, tied a rakhi to Riya's brother, Shivam. This emotional meeting connected two families bound by grief and gratitude, as Anamta became a living embodiment of Riya's legacy. The gesture highlighted the profound impact of organ donation, uniting tradition and humanity.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/meerut/rakhi-with-donors-hand-mumbai-teen-meets-her-new-brother-in-gujarat/articleshow/123200364.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/meerut/rakhi-with-donors-hand-mumbai-teen-meets-her-new-brother-in-gujarat/articleshow/123200364.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 09:51:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SANDEEP RAI AND YAGNESH BHARAT MEHTA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="49608" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123200409,imgsize-49608.cms"/></item><item><title>Eastern Ukraine in exchange for peace? Putin's demand ahead of meeting with Trump</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump will meet Vladimir Putin in Alaska on August 15, 2025, to negotiate a potential end to the Russia-Ukraine war. Putin is reportedly seeking control over eastern Ukraine, specifically Luhansk, Donetsk, Zaporizhzhia, and Kherson, along with global recognition of Russia's claims, in exchange for a ceasefire. Trump anticipates territory swaps as part of any peace agreement.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/eastern-ukraine-in-exchange-for-peace-vladimir-putins-demand-ahead-of-alaska-meeting-with-donald-trump-report/articleshow/123200012.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/eastern-ukraine-in-exchange-for-peace-vladimir-putins-demand-ahead-of-alaska-meeting-with-donald-trump-report/articleshow/123200012.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 10:23:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="878749" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123200668,imgsize-878749.cms"/></item><item><title>Railways launches 20% rebate on return tickets to ease Diwali-Chhath festival rush</title><description><![CDATA[To ease Diwali and Chhath rush, railways introduces a 'Round Trip Package' offering a 20% fare rebate on return journeys booked together. Bookings open August 14, 2025, for onward travel between October 13-26, 2025, and return travel between November 17-December 1. The scheme aims to manage passenger traffic, improve train utilization, and benefit passengers planning extended vacations.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/railways-launches-20-rebate-on-return-tickets-to-ease-diwali-chhath-festival-rush/articleshow/123202227.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/railways-launches-20-rebate-on-return-tickets-to-ease-diwali-chhath-festival-rush/articleshow/123202227.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 12:50:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DIPAK K DASH</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="726078" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123202265,imgsize-726078.cms"/></item><item><title>Why are Trump, Putin meeting in Alaska and will Zelenskyy be present?</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump is set to meet Vladimir Putin in Alaska on August 15, 2025, aiming to broker a peace deal to end the Ukraine war. Trump believes he has "a shot" at securing peace, hinting at possible territory swaps. The meeting follows a visit by Trump’s envoy to Moscow, though Russia dismissed a three-way summit with Zelenskyy.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/russia-ukraine-war-why-are-donald-trump-vladimir-putin-meeting-in-alaska-and-will-zelenskyy-be-present-all-you-need-to-know/articleshow/123199907.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/russia-ukraine-war-why-are-donald-trump-vladimir-putin-meeting-in-alaska-and-will-zelenskyy-be-present-all-you-need-to-know/articleshow/123199907.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 09:18:16 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="48774" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123200085,imgsize-48774.cms"/></item><item><title>Triple murder in Delhi: Man kills wife, daughters in Karawal Nagar; accused absconding</title><description><![CDATA[In a tragic incident in Delhi's Karawal Nagar, police are actively searching for a man named Pradeep, who is suspected of murdering his wife, Jaya Shri, and their two young daughters, aged five and seven. Preliminary investigations suggest that ongoing marital disputes may have been a contributing factor in this horrific crime.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/triple-murder-in-delhi-man-kills-wife-daughters-in-karawal-nagar-accused-absconding/articleshow/123200549.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/triple-murder-in-delhi-man-kills-wife-daughters-in-karawal-nagar-accused-absconding/articleshow/123200549.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 10:13:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ABHAY</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="87892" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123202526,imgsize-87892.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump ‘nobel’ for Nobel: Now, Armenia and Azerbaijan back US President for peace prize</title><description><![CDATA[Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan and Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyev have jointly endorsed Donald Trump for the Nobel Peace Prize. This follows a landmark peace agreement mediated by Trump between the two nations, ending decades of conflict. Both leaders lauded Trump's efforts at a White House signing, emphasizing his role in achieving the breakthrough.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/peace-in-the-caucasuses-armenia-azerbaijan-back-donald-trump-for-nobel-prize-full-list-of-countries-backing-us-president/articleshow/123199806.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/peace-in-the-caucasuses-armenia-azerbaijan-back-donald-trump-for-nobel-prize-full-list-of-countries-backing-us-president/articleshow/123199806.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 09:10:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="61334" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123199866,imgsize-61334.cms"/></item><item><title>Arriving in Delhi! Tesla to open second India Showroom - check details</title><description><![CDATA[Tesla is expanding its presence in India, opening its second showroom in Delhi on August 11, following its Mumbai debut. The new Tesla Experience Centre will be located in Aerocity's Worldmark 3 complex. Tesla officially entered India last month with the launch of its Model Y, with deliveries expected to begin in the third quarter of 2025.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/arriving-in-delhi-tesla-to-open-second-india-showroom-check-date-and-other-details/articleshow/123201642.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/arriving-in-delhi-tesla-to-open-second-india-showroom-check-date-and-other-details/articleshow/123201642.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 12:04:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="71286" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123201714,imgsize-71286.cms"/></item><item><title>Rooting for Joe Root! Can England batter end his wait for a ton Down Under?</title><description><![CDATA[The Test great has left contemporaries trailing in his dust since the pandemic, so much so that only the inimitable Sachin Tendulkar now stands above him. Singh attributed this growth to the collaborative efforts of the Department of Defence Production, DPSUs, public sector manufacturers, and the private industry.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/defence-output-soars-annual-production-in-fy25-hits-rs-1-5-lakh-crore-rajnath-singh-gives-details/articleshow/123201186.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/defence-output-soars-annual-production-in-fy25-hits-rs-1-5-lakh-crore-rajnath-singh-gives-details/articleshow/123201186.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 11:29:31 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1124236" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123201223,imgsize-1124236.cms"/></item><item><title>Make America Baked Again? Trump talks weed over dinner with donors</title><description><![CDATA[US President Trump has reignited discussions on federal marijuana restrictions, hinting at potential policy changes. During a recent gathering, he acknowledged the need to re-evaluate the existing regulations. This comes nearly a year after he initially suggested easing access to regulated cannabis and granting states greater autonomy. While some advisors see cannabis reform as a boost for the upcoming midterms, others caution against potential legal and moral repercussions.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/make-america-baked-again-trump-talks-weed-over-dinner-with-doners-hints-at-marijuana-move/articleshow/123200165.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/make-america-baked-again-trump-talks-weed-over-dinner-with-doners-hints-at-marijuana-move/articleshow/123200165.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 09:40:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="610812" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123200186,imgsize-610812.cms"/></item><item><title>Delhi rains: Yamuna has brush with ‘danger’ for 2 hours; crosses 205.33m mark</title><description><![CDATA[The Yamuna River in Delhi reached a seasonal high of 205.15 meters, nearing the danger level before receding. The flood helped improve water quality by flushing out toxins, highlighting the importance of river flows.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/yamuna-has-brush-with-danger-for-two-hours/articleshow/123194309.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/yamuna-has-brush-with-danger-for-two-hours/articleshow/123194309.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 04:32:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PRIYANGI AGARWAL</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1343692" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123200984,imgsize-1343692.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Chaos at Delhi airport as Air India delay angers passengers</title><description><![CDATA[An Air India flight delay at Delhi's airport sparked a tense confrontation between passengers and airline staff. Swift has been seen reconnecting with Gomez, while distancing herself from Lively and Ryan Reynolds.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/selena-gomez-opens-up-about-taylor-swift-as-the-pop-star-and-travis-kelce-reportedly-end-all-ties-with-blake-lively/articleshow/123168788.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/selena-gomez-opens-up-about-taylor-swift-as-the-pop-star-and-travis-kelce-reportedly-end-all-ties-with-blake-lively/articleshow/123168788.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 02:33:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1096363" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123168884,imgsize-1096363.cms"/></item><item><title>'Short tempered': Huma Qureshi cousin murdered in Delhi - accused brothers known for picking fights</title><description><![CDATA[In Delhi's Jangpura, Asif Qureshi, cousin of actress Huma Qureshi, was fatally stabbed following a parking dispute with brothers Ujjawal and Gautam. An audio clip reveals threats against those working with Khan, vowing violence, even murder, using AK-47s.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/will-kill-anyone-working-with-salman-khan-after-kapil-sharmas-caf-shooting-lawrence-bishnoi-gang-threatens-directors-says-we-will-ruin-atmosphere-of-mumbai/articleshow/123199015.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/will-kill-anyone-working-with-salman-khan-after-kapil-sharmas-caf-shooting-lawrence-bishnoi-gang-threatens-directors-says-we-will-ruin-atmosphere-of-mumbai/articleshow/123199015.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 06:47:41 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>RAJ SHEKHAR JHA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="31586" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123199030,imgsize-31586.cms"/></item><item><title>Marathi vs non-Marathi row: MNS men assault idli vendor in Kalyan; heated spat erupts on train</title><description><![CDATA[Recent incidents highlight the Marathi versus non-Marathi divide in Maharashtra. Greater Manchester Police are investigating, and Ali has been released on bail. His young career so far has included the iconic India vs Pakistan match at the 2022 T20 World Cup but he was unable to make a mark in that contest.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/watch-when-hardik-pandya-dismissed-haider-ali-the-pakistani-cricketer-arrested-on-rape-charges-in-the-uk/articleshow/123199614.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/watch-when-hardik-pandya-dismissed-haider-ali-the-pakistani-cricketer-arrested-on-rape-charges-in-the-uk/articleshow/123199614.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 08:31:39 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="39544" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123199726,imgsize-39544.cms"/></item><item><title>India seeks 200 copters to replace ageing Cheetah & Chetak fleet</title><description><![CDATA[India is urgently seeking to replace its aging Cheetah and Chetak helicopters, which are plagued by safety concerns and outdated technology. The Army has issued a request for information to acquire 120 reconnaissance and surveillance helicopters, while the IAF needs 80, aiming to modernize its fleet and enhance operational capabilities after decades of delays.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-seeks-200-copters-to-replace-ageing-cheetah-chetak-fleet/articleshow/123196628.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-seeks-200-copters-to-replace-ageing-cheetah-chetak-fleet/articleshow/123196628.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 03:10:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>RAJAT PANDIT</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="524488" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123196736,imgsize-524488.cms"/></item><item><title>'Could have used better language': Ex-Aussie star weighs in on Gambhir–curator clash</title><description><![CDATA[Matthew Hayden commented on Gautam Gambhir's heated exchange with the Oval pitch curator, Lee Fortis, during India's training session. Hayden acknowledged Gambhir's frustration with perceived restrictions but suggested he could have used better language. Greg Blewett echoed the sentiment, recalling similar frustrations and noting the language used wasn't ideal, despite India securing a series-levelling victory.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/could-have-toned-it-down-former-aussie-cricketer-weighs-in-on-gautam-gambhircurator-oval-showdown/articleshow/123199306.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/could-have-toned-it-down-former-aussie-cricketer-weighs-in-on-gautam-gambhircurator-oval-showdown/articleshow/123199306.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 07:26:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="70826" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123199310,imgsize-70826.cms"/></item><item><title>Amid escalation with US, PM Modi and Putin back India-Russia ties</title><description><![CDATA[Amidst strained US-India relations due to trade disputes over Russian ties, PM Modi and President Putin reaffirmed their commitment to strengthening India-Russia relations. Modi expressed support for resolving the Russia-Ukraine conflict through diplomacy and invited Putin to India for the annual summit.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/amid-escalation-with-us-pm-modi-and-putin-back-india-russia-ties/articleshow/123195257.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/amid-escalation-with-us-pm-modi-and-putin-back-india-russia-ties/articleshow/123195257.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 00:02:08 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SACHIN PARASHAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="869262" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123195252,imgsize-869262.cms"/></item><item><title>WTC glory needs specialists, not stopgaps — Gambhir must rethink his approach</title><description><![CDATA[Under Gautam Gambhir, India have played 15 Test matches, winning five and losing eight, including an embarrassing series defeat at home to New Zealand, their first in 12 years. His red-ball tactics have raised eyebrows; his rigidity in prioritising batting depth over balance, and his decision to keep Kuldeep Yadav on the bench, cost India a golden chance to bury the Bazballers once and for all. India did manage to draw the series, thanks to a spirited performance by the extraordinary skills of Mohammed Siraj, but they should have beaten toothless England.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/wtc-glory-needs-specialists-not-stopgaps-gautam-gambhir-must-rethink-his-test-approach/articleshow/123198606.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/wtc-glory-needs-specialists-not-stopgaps-gautam-gambhir-must-rethink-his-test-approach/articleshow/123198606.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 06:19:40 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PRATYUSH RAJ</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="148282" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123198659,imgsize-148282.cms"/></item><item><title>India won't bow down to anybody, says Piyush Goyal</title><description><![CDATA[Piyush Goyal asserted India's resilience, stating it won't bow down to anyone and will capitalize on global trade restructuring. He expressed confidence in India's economic strength and ability to find opportunities amidst crises like potential Trump tariffs. Goyal highlighted India's growing global recognition and attractiveness as a market, dismissing concerns about its economic status.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-wont-bow-down-to-anybody-says-piyush-goyal/articleshow/123196865.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-wont-bow-down-to-anybody-says-piyush-goyal/articleshow/123196865.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 03:36:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="851278" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123196894,imgsize-851278.cms"/></item><item><title>51-foot-tall statue of Lord Ram unveiled in Canada's Mississauga</title><description><![CDATA[A towering 51-foot statue of Lord Ram, inspired by the Ayodhya temple, has been unveiled in Mississauga, becoming North America's tallest. Made in Delhi and assembled in Canada, the statue can withstand high winds and is visible from Toronto airport. The inauguration was celebrated by the Hindu community and attended by Canadian politicians, marking a significant spiritual landmark.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/51-foot-tall-statue-of-lord-ram-unveiled-in-canadas-mississauga-mayor-says-spectacular-landmark-for-hindu-community/articleshow/123145252.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/51-foot-tall-statue-of-lord-ram-unveiled-in-canadas-mississauga-mayor-says-spectacular-landmark-for-hindu-community/articleshow/123145252.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 20:33:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="41588" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123145268,imgsize-41588.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <title><![CDATA[Policybazaar for Business flags low use of parametric insurance: How it can tackle climate risks]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/finance/policybazaar-flags-low-use-parametric-insurance-how-can-tackle-climate-risks-19647330.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Unlike traditional insurance, parametric products offer automatic payouts when a weather event crosses a pre-set limit — no paperwork, no surveyors, and no disputes. If rainfall drops below a threshold or wind speeds fall short, policyholders get paid in days.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Fri, 1 Aug 2025 16:38:22 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Anshul</dc:creator>

      <description><![CDATA[Starbucks is trying to stage a comeback after an uncharacteristic streak of same-store sales declines over the past year and a half.
